svg.text: SAGA PRYOR DATA CENTER - ELECTRICAL SINGLE LINE DIAGRAM
13.8kV Multi-Source MV Distribution | Utility + Generators + Alt Sources
Utility at Top | Color-Coded Ring Bus | No Corner Connections
NOTES - SLD Standards v1.1 Compliant (Rev G):
1. SOURCE HIERARCHY: Utility feeds ALWAYS at top (above all other sources) - critical rule
2. TOPOLOGY: 6 RMUs â†’ 6 Transformers â†’ 6 LV-SWBDs (1:1:1 relationship per BOD)
3. MULTIPLE SOURCES: Utility (grid) at top, Generators (6Ã—4MW diesel) center, Other Sources (solar/turbine/hydro) below
4. MINIMIZED GRAPHICS: Equipment sizes reduced while maintaining spacing rules - Gen sync bus 50px height, generators 28px radius
5. Ring bus pathways: Color-coded by RMU, separated with 31.4px spacing, staggered for clear delineation
6. RMU incomers: Connect on TOP of RMU (30px from corners, not AT corners) - primary left, reserve right
7. MV-SWBDs: Show 6 feeder breaker positions (one per RMU) with color-coded feeders matching RMU incomers
8. Connection rule: ALL equipment connections have minimum spacing from corners (not at corners)
9. 90-degree bends only: No diagonal connections, all pathways use orthogonal routing
10. Equipment labels: Placed outside and to the right of graphics with symmetrical spacing
11. Color coding: RMU incomers color-coded for traceability, outgoers remain black per standard
12. IEEE Std 315 / IEC 60617 compliant | Total IT: 6.2MVA | Mech: 2.0MW
